description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: SELECT -1*(last("raidFreeSize") -11500000000000) AS "SizeUsed" FROM "raidTable" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT -1*(last("raidFreeSize") -11500000000000) AS "SizeUsed" FROM "raidTable" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ifTable" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.1.5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ifTable" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.1.5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ifTable" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.1.5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ifTable" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.1.5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Syno:
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp.SYNO" WITH KEY = "agent_host"

list.label: Interface:
list.name: intf
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "ifTable" WITH KEY = "ifDescr" WHERE "agent_host" =~ /^$host/

title: Synology DashBoard
